name: Halloween Quest (Carlos Cruz)
description:
A 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a boy dressed as a wizard on Halloween with the goal of rescuing his cat from the monsters that have captured him. Use a magic wand that summons blocks in front of you to locate the key and reach the door at the end of the stage.

Project Overview:
Details
- Genre: Platformer/Puzzle
- Platform: PC
- Game Engine: Unity
- Role: Creator, Game Designer, Artist, Programmer

Project Goals:
- Players build a connection with the main character and engage with the overall story
- Satisfying puzzles that allow multiple ways to solve
- Use block mechanic to allow unique level designs

Project Breakdown:
- Year 2022
- Duration: 8 months
- Team size: 1

Soundtrack by Battle of the Bits Spooky VRC6 all artists are credited at the ending.
